entry.string: Format Anti-Bot is a Xaraya Utility Module.

The module secures forms from abuse by bot's by requiring translation and input of image based text, sometimes known as CAPTCHA. The module can only be used in conjunction with other Xaraya modules that support it.
The following modules currently support FormAnti-Bot:
Sitecontact module - a contact form module allowing multiple, custom contact forms, and optional saving of data.
At this point, only modules that have chosen to include support for this module will be able to utilize it. Read: no hooks are as yet available for this module.
Further information on the FormAnti-Bot module can be found at
Click on Version History tab at the bottom to get the latest release information.
Related tutorials and documentation on FormAnti-Bot found at
